title: Lol workout
body:
1 death = +10 push ups
1 kill= -1 push up
5 assists = -1 push up
win = -5 push ups
defeat = +20 push ups
surrender= +40 push ups

great motivation to do your best and if you feed its a great workout

replies.body:
I feel like supports need a slightly different version, 'cause we get quite a few assists. :P

Love the idea, though!

LOL omg WHAT IF IM ON TILT
OH GOD MY BODY NO

I do something similar with my Violin.

Every death is 5 more minutes of practice time, some days I get off easy, some days I get 30 total deaths {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

So, if i win and i do 10/0/20 i dive myself in a pool of chocolate?

**deal**
